testcase.name: Retry mechanism should retry the test if it fails upto 3 attempts
testcase.classname: should retry the test if it fails upto 3 attempts

failure.message: Timed out retrying after 4000ms: expected 'https://ecommerce-admin.azureedge.net/login' to include '/dashboard'
